transcript:
Customer: Teri mitti mein mil jaava gul ban ke main khil jaava itni si hai dil ki
Hello
Hello
Hello
Executive: Ji sir. 
Executive: Hi sir, good morning.
Customer: Ji good morning. Kanhaiya Industries pe baat ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir main Abhinav baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke head office Noida se, aapka account manager.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji sir abhi hum logon ne jo hai wo services hum logon ki live ho chuki hai, theek hai? To mujhe aapko guide karna hai ki portal kaise use karte hain sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur buylead kya hoti hai, inquiries kya hoti hain, sara sab kuch mujhe aapko guide karna hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji to ek baar main aap isme to jitna jyada requirement aaya hai sab Muzaffarpur se jitna aa raha hai sab to fake hi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek baar main wo sab bhi check kar lunga, kuch filters vagera hai wo filter aapko bata dunga kaise filter use karte hain.
Customer: Sab cheez wo sab cheez jante hain jankari hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ji ji. Nahi mujhe sir apne end se ek baar batana hoga na kyunki main hi ab ek saal aapki services dekhunga.
Executive: To mujhe ek baar apne end se batana hai aur apne end se filter vagera dekhna hai ki kis vajah se lead aapko relevant nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: To jitne bhi sir bugs aa rahe hain aaj hi usko fix karte hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji to ek baar aap apni register mail ID bataiyega.
Customer: Kumar Saurav Raj78@gmail.com jo yahan pe hai wahi hai na sir?
Customer: Ji ji wo hai aur ek aur hai Kanhaiya Industries@gmail.com. Ek minute.
Executive: Sir services matlab basically aap hi dekhte hain?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Staff hai lekin chhutti hai aaj yahan pe vote hai na.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Dekhiye Abhinav Srivastava IndiaMART ke naam se koi mail aayi hai kya?
Customer: Abhinav Srivastava naam se.
Executive: Abhinav Srivastava IndiaMART ke naam se mail aayi hogi.
Executive: Aapki jo maine mail ID pe bheja wo Kumar Saurav wale pe bheja hai, theek hai sir?
Customer: Kumar Sauravraj78@gmail.com.
Customer: Kab ke date mein?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Lavi Kumar Lavi Kumar ke naam se hai.
Executive: Nahi Abhinav Srivastava ke naam se aayi hogi, ek baar refresh kijiye.
Executive: Abhinav Srivastava IndiaMART ke naam se.
Customer: Nahi hai.
Executive: Isme Kumar Saurav Raj wale pe hi check kar rahe hain na sir?
Customer: Kumar Saurav Raj wale pe hi check kar rahe hain na sir?
Customer: Sorry Kanhaiya Industries haan abhi aaya in.
Executive: Aa gaya?
Customer: Haan aa gaya.
Executive: Wo usko sir dekhiye wahan pe ek option likha hoga join with Google Meet. Aap phone se join karenge sir ya laptop se?
Customer: Phone se.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai wahan se dekhiye ek option hoga join with Google Meet sir.
Executive: Join with Google Meet pe click kariye.
Executive: Wahan pe click karne ke baad ek option aayega join now ka.
Customer: Join now kar diye.
Executive: Ab dekhiye sir wahan pe ek option aa raha hoga three dot ka. Ek baar three dot pe click karke screen share kar dijiye.
Executive: Red button ke bagal mein hoga three dot. Three dot pe ja ke ek bari screen share kar dijiye.
Customer: Ye dusre mobile mein hum aise hi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: India matlab dusre mobile se aise chala rahe hain.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main apni screen present kar raha hun, main apni screen present karke aapko guide kar deta hun. To main na aapko sir kyunki yahan pe kya hai na recorded line se call aur video meeting ek sath nahi ho sakti. Main aapko apne phone se kar raha hun, theek hai ek baar aap apna number boliyega.
Customer: 8340200120.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: 8340 83
Executive: 83
Customer: Ji.
Executive: 8340
Customer: 240
Executive: 240
Customer: 200
Executive: 200
Customer: 120
Executive: 120 8340200120 right sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai main ispe call kar raha hun, theek hai sir?
Customer: Kar jaaiye.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states fake leads from Muzaffarpur.

- Wants to know how to use portal.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check filters.

- Executive will guide on portal usage.

- Executive will call on personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on personal number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, portal, google meet
